title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 1002.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 1002.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part establishes procedures and requirements for
assuring that the applicant will comply with the terms, conditions, limitations, or modifications of the construction and operation of the facility
authorized in the certificate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
1002.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
